something_you_did_other_reason_details: Chris, it is important that you consider the language that you use when giving answers to the questions asked. For example, in your presentation, there were a number of negative phrases that you used when explaining the situation of overcoming adversity.
candidate_behaviour_what_to_improve: Please consider the language and the tone that you use in your answers.
performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: In addition to the comments above regarding the language used in response to the presentation and questions, many of the answers lacked focus and depth. There were many times throughout the interview when the answers did not respond to the questions. In addition, please ensure that you have researched the curriculum prior to interview.
